dialogue.text: BF and GF find themselves in a beachtown, right on the edge of Eastar. The town itself, is named Horseshoe.
Something's weird here, BF. I don't understand where we are, and... I swear I've seen this place before...
Beep, skeedooo bop, aai? Bep... Ai?
I... would be surprised if that was the case. It's not like we're strangers to weird\ndimensional travel...
*Stomach growls in Beep*\nbeeeeehhp. ais, skedoo...
... You seriously didn't eat breakfast before hopping into some strange mystery portal???\nWow, BF.
B-bweeep.
After a moment of... getting lost, the two would find a place to get out of the sun.
A simple resturaunt, perfect for a quick bite to eat. As they sat down to eat, a voice called out from the back.
I'll be right there! I just have to clear away a few things in the back!
Whoever this is, her voice is soft, yet quite energetic in tone. BF and GF take a seat at a booth.
Hey! Beep, skedooo-! Dah, bop!
You think this place looks familiar?\nHow come?
Beh! Ais, ska bap! Dop ka ai! *pointing*
As BF pointed in the direction of a fox with a damaged ear, appearing to be in a relaxed position, GF blinked, before her eyes go wide.
No way. That's not at all who I think it is, is it? We might have an issue here, BF.
Beskaboop?
Seriously. We're 'humans' in a world where, typically, those don't exist... I don't know if we're even safe to be here, but...
I think we'll be fine if we don't get into\ntrouble...
HELLO THERE! WELCOME TO BONNIE'S!\nWhat can I get you???
What? Do i have something in my hair, or...\nHhhuh. What... are you guys? I don't think I've seen you around in Horseshoe before...
Uhhh... We're just really weird looking drops!\nY-yeah! Drops! (BF, just run with it...)
B-bep... behh?
Huh. Anyways, You look like you're starving, What can I get ya?
Bonnie handed the two a menu, as they chuckle a little awkwardly.  The language on the menu seems to be unreadable to them, as
they try to discern the language, Bonnie's eyebrow raises in curiousity.
Ah... uh... H-how about the ah... number two?\nThat actually looks good.
Behh... ski...? Ka doo, Bah ai?\nBap bopbe.
A-ah, he's not the best with common. He's asking for the same order that I did. Except he wants... 'That Spicy Sauce, yo'.
Yeah!
... Beep, GF... Bep be skedoo bopee?\nAi, skidoo bep bop... ... ...
Crap! You're right... We don't have a way to pay for it...
Wait, No way to pay? Like, you don't even have an IOU, or like... anything?
Yeah, uh... usually we have the money, but I left my purse back at home, so... And, it's uh, ah... quite far from here???
Beeeeeeep, skedooooo~ Ski badupop!\nBep, aiai! Skedpop?
BF's offering to entertain your guests, as well as do a rap battle for the meal.\nHe's also, excited to perform in a new place.
A singing competition, huh? Usually, Varia is the one singing, but I'm not too shabby myself... Y'know what? You're on!
Yeah! Skeebedoopop.~
Hah! I think I like the sound of that, little dude! Let's put on a hell of a show!
